timelineElements.title: Web Developer Mentor (Webmentor Group Bt.)
timelineElements.description: Mentoring included consultancy, continous assistance, creating information material (articles, e-book, video course)

timelineElements.title: OnlineVagyok
timelineElements.description: My first web development enterprise is now under full control of my former team.

timelineElements.title: Impact Hub Budapest
timelineElements.description: Supporting educational and marketing activities, helping with the organization of events, and carrying out web development tasks.

timelineElements.title: Holistic Medical Health Center
timelineElements.description: I got familiar with WordPress and gained a great deal of experience in marketing.

timelineElements.title: AIESEC
timelineElements.description: Dealing with marketing, organizational tasks, contact with NGOs, and supporting foreigners living in Hungary among other responsibilities.

timelineElements.title: Corvinus University of Budapest
timelineElements.description: The reason behind choosing studies were the opportunities of networking, preparing to start an enterprise, and developing my mathematics and language skills.

specialties.title: Full-stack web development
specialties.description: When I started web development in 2012 while in high school as a hobby, I did not know it was going to be my main occupation later.

references.title: Csomagpont accounting system and other API connections

specialties.title: Education
specialties.description: I always felt a special kind of passion towards learning and passing on my knowledge, for this reason I started educational projects whenever I had the opportunity.

references.title: Egyetemistából vállalkozó (From university student to enterpreneur)

specialties.title: WordPress development
specialties.description: There were many companies in my environment managing WordPress site on a user level, so I met their demands by offering custom WordPress development services.

references.title: Balaicza private health center clinical evidence system

offers.title: Self-dependence, problem-solving
offers.description: I got used to solving any given task only by myself.

offers.title: Quick learning
offers.description: I am ready to learn anything and I even enjoy it.

offers.title: Flexibility
offers.description: I consider a job done if my partner is satisfied, even if it means taking extra steps.

offers.title: Punctuality, reliability
offers.description: It is rare for a project not to be late in today's business world, but there were very few times when someone needed to wait for me to finish.

offers.title: Self-employed
offers.description: I can do my own taxes and provide other requirements for myself in order to complete the job.

demands.title: Flexible working place and hours
demands.description: In order to use my energies the most efficiently.

demands.title: Evaluation based on performance
demands.description: Instead of hours spent idle the value of work is what matters.

demands.title: Friendly, confidential environment
demands.description: I do my best during work and assume the same about others. I like if this is mutual.

demands.title: Regular payment on a monthly basis
demands.description: In order to keep my focus on the job instead ofhandling financial instability.

motivation: Although I had many exciting projects to develop myself professionally in the last few years, leading my own company meant a dozen of duties that made it heavy to concentrate on the essential work itself. Recently I felt the calling to practice and study web development on a deeper level, run a great career in this area, and having a stable environment around me, which enables this. In addition, I am constantly striving to reach a professional-private life balance, where I can give the best of myself in all areas of life.
